MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY12 postcode area of Ellesmere affecting properties in Criftins and the surrounding area. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.14am on 12th of Nov 2020.
